name: WESTERN ELECTRIC CO., INC. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator

parties: WESTERN ELECTRIC CO., INC. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Christopher H. Little, Providence, for petitioner.
Marcia McGair Ippolito, Division of Taxation, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
WESTERN ELECTRIC CO., INC. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.
No. 83-286-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
June 23, 1983.
Christopher H. Little, Providence, for petitioner.
Marcia McGair Ippolito, Division of Taxation, Providence, for respondent.
